prompts: Create a small fire-type Pokemon with a round body and a fiery tail.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of flames with bright red and yellow colors.
Generate a creature that stands bipedal and breathes fire, looking adorable yet fierce.
Make a fire Pokemon with a playful personality and a vibrant, warm color palette.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas, showcasing its fire abilities in the city.
Design a Pokemon with unique features like short arms and a fiery head crest.
Show me a tiny fire Pokemon that can evolve into a much larger, powerful creature.
